name: Auger
description:
Full Description

Trapped in a volcanic arena, you find yourself armed with an enchanted rifle and confronted with a colossus fiery demon. With limited options you must run, jump and shoot to avoid succumbing to your inevitable frightful fate. 

Controls

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Left Shift

Jump/Double Jump - Spacebar

Shoot/Cancel reload - Left click

Reload - R

How to play

Run around the arena to dodge plummeting rocks; hide behind crude pillars to avoid scalding lasers; and jump from searing tiles and lava alike. Shoot at the demon's armor to destroy it, and expose its vulnerable body. Performing a full reload grants you a mystical damage buff.

Development

The game was originally created as a one-week gamejam / group project for university. Featuring Alistair Keen (Artist), James Foster (Artist), Steven Nightingale (artist), Tyler Baird (Programmer) and myself (Programmer). With permission I revisited the game to perform a full remaster which included: upgrading the render pipeline, new shaders, new audio, new animations, and rewriting all the code.
